casebody.data:
JURISDICTIONAL MOTIONS ALLOWED

92-2240. Trinova Corp. v. Pilkington Bros., P.L.C.

Lucas County, No. L-90-096. On motion to certify the record and on motion of Peter C. John for leave to proceed pro hac vice. Motions granted.

F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., dissent. Resnick, J., not participating.
